properties.name: bigellor.gen-test-data
properties.description: Populate exemplary test data at startup such as pre-defined signatures or bigraphs.

properties.name: bigellor.model.storage.location
properties.description: Specify the upload directory of Bigellor for model files.

properties.name: bigellor.cdo.config
properties.description: Specify the CDO database properties (XML) for Bigellor to start the CDO database server.
